text: ) This transmits obsolete IRM
, Information Technology (IT) Security, International Machines (IBM) Mainframe System Security Requirements. (
) This transmits obsolete all versions of IRM
, Information Technology (IT) Security, International Business Machines (IBM) Mainframe System Security Requirements. (
) Portions of IRM
, Information Technology (IT) Security, International Business Machines Mainframe System Security Requirements, dated
, are obsolete as of the IRM date and the remaining portions are incorporated into IRM
, Mainframe System Security Policy.
MATERIAL CHANGES
The material relating to Roles and Responsibilities previously contained in IRM section 10.8.32.2 is incorporated into new IRM 10.8.33.2.

) The material relating to References previously contained in IRM section Exhibit
is incorporated into new IRM References
IRM 10.8.32, dated July 10, 2017, is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.

IRM 10.8.32 shall be distributed to all personnel responsible for ensuring that adequate security is IRS information and information systems. This policy applies to all employees, contractors, and vendors IRS.
